turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, from where?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: cappuccino.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sorry, can you say that again?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, they offer soy, almond, 2%, non fat, whole, and coconut milk.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what size would you like that in?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's medium sized.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: they offer short, tall, grande, or venti size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, and which location would you like to pick up from?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, let me send your order to that location, one moment.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i have ordered you a tall cappuccino with coconut milk to be picked up from the starbucks on 4th street in colorado springs.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your receipt will be texted to you and your drink will be ready in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. No, thanks. Goodbye.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your coffee.
